name: Colorize the Ufo
description:
Change Ufo's color, collect the objects which same color, overcome obstacles and staying alive in space. CONTROLS
  • Move ufo to left and right with arrow keys.
  • Change Ufo's color with spacebar.
CREDITS
  • All of the textures created with Adobe Illustrator.
  • All of sounds created by differents artists from FreeSound.
